queries.sql: SELECT intCol, longCol, doubleCol, strCol FROM {tbl1}
SELECT {tbl1}.intCol, {tbl2}.strCol FROM {tbl1}, {tbl2} WHERE {tbl1}.intCol = {tbl2}.intCol
SELECT {tbl1}.*, {tbl2}.strCol FROM {tbl1}, {tbl2} WHERE {tbl1}.intCol = {tbl2}.intCol
SELECT intCol as "value", doubleCol + floatCol AS "sum" FROM {tbl1}
SELECT intCol as "from" FROM {tbl1}
SELECT intCol as key, SUM(doubleCol + floatCol) AS aggSum FROM {tbl1} GROUP BY intCol
SELECT intCol, SUM(avgVal) FROM (SELECT strCol, intCol, AVG(doubleCol) AS avgVal FROM {tbl1} GROUP BY intCol, strCol) GROUP BY intCol

SELECT strCol, MAX(sumVal), MAX(sumVal + avgVal) AS transVal FROM (SELECT strCol, intCol, SUM(floatCol + 2 * intCol) AS sumVal, AVG(doubleCol) AS avgVal FROM {tbl1} GROUP BY strCol, intCol) GROUP BY strCol ORDER BY MAX(sumVal)
SELECT intCol, intCol AS intAlias FROM {tbl1} WHERE intCol < 100
SELECT intCol, intCol AS intAlias, doubleCol, strCol, strCol AS strAlias FROM {tbl1}
SELECT intCol, intCol AS intAlias FROM {tbl1} WHERE intCol < 100 ORDER BY doubleCol
SELECT intCol, intCol AS intAlias FROM {tbl1} WHERE intCol < 100 ORDER BY intCol
SELECT intCol, intCol AS intAlias FROM {tbl1} WHERE intCol < 100 ORDER BY intAlias
SELECT intCol, intCol AS intAlias, doubleCol, strCol, strCol AS strAlias FROM {tbl1} ORDER BY intCol
SELECT intCol, intCol AS intAlias, doubleCol, strCol, strCol AS strAlias FROM {tbl1} ORDER BY strCol, intCol
SELECT intCol, intCol AS intAlias, doubleCol, strCol, strCol AS strAlias FROM {tbl1} ORDER BY strAlias, intAlias
SELECT intCol, intCol AS intAlias, doubleCol, strCol, strCol AS strAlias FROM {tbl1} ORDER BY floatCol, intCol
SELECT intCol, intCol AS intAlias, doubleCol, strCol, strCol AS strAlias FROM {tbl1} ORDER BY floatCol
SELECT intCol + intAlias FROM (SELECT intCol, intCol as intAlias FROM {tbl1}) WHERE intCol < 100
SELECT intCol + alias FROM (SELECT intCol, intCol as alias FROM {tbl1}) WHERE intCol < 100
SELECT intCol, intCol, doubleCol, strCol, strCol FROM {tbl1}
SELECT {tbl1}.intCol, {tbl1}.intCol, {tbl1}.doubleCol, {tbl2}.strCol, {tbl2}.strCol FROM {tbl1}, {tbl2} WHERE {tbl1}.intCol = {tbl2}.intCol
SELECT {tbl2}.intCol, {tbl2}.intCol FROM {tbl1}, {tbl2} WHERE {tbl1}.intCol = {tbl2}.intCol AND {tbl1}.intCol < 100 ORDER BY {tbl1}.doubleCol

queries.comment: select intCol, intCol without aliasing one of them is not supported.
queries.sql: SELECT intCol, intCol FROM {tbl1} WHERE intCol < 100
